snippet: Seven Kosovars are accused of luring victims from Turkey and former Communist countries to Pristina to sell their kidneys with false promises of payments of up to €15,000, or nearly $20,000.
lead_paragraph: Seven Kosovars are accused of luring victims from Turkey and former Communist countries to Pristina to sell their kidneys with false promises of payments of up to €15,000, or nearly $20,000.

headline.main: Trial Opens for 7 Kosovars in Organ-Trafficking Case
headline.print_headline: Trial Begins On Trafficking Of Organs In Kosovo
